# requestPlaybackRestrictionsAuthorization(_:)

**Instance Method**

Determines whether this item is subject to parental restrictions, and, if so, prompts the user to enter the restrictions passcode.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func requestPlaybackRestrictionsAuthorization(_ completion: @escaping (Bool, (any Error)?) -> Void)
```

```swift
@MainActor func requestPlaybackRestrictionsAuthorization() async throws -> Bool
```

## Parameters

- **completion**: A callback the system invokes after it makes a determination of parental restrictions.



## Requesting playback authorization in tvOS

- **cancelPlaybackRestrictionsAuthorizationRequest()**: Cancels a pending authorization request and dismisses the passcode entry, if displayed.
